before_start: {"blocks":[{"key":"4u33q","text":"ABT263 must first be dissolved in the vehicle by heating to 60°C.  Sonication can be used to dissolve faster. See the materials section for specifics.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

creator.name: Andrew Davis
creator.affiliation: Sanford Burnham Prebys Medical Discovery Institute

affiliations.affiliation: Sanford Burnham Prebys Medical Discovery Institute

description: {"blocks":[{"key":"49v3j","text":"This protocol is for treating mice with the senolytic, Navitoclax, by oral gavage.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
ethics_statement: {"blocks":[{"key":"fm5q0","text":"All experiments using mice should be first approved by the appropriate oversight organization of your locale.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
materials_text: {"blocks":[{"key":"24ind","text":"ABT263 (Navitoclax) from SelleckChem (cat no S1001)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"aavbg","text":"Phosal 50PG from Fisher Scientific (cat no 502029444)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5j6bl","text":"PEG400 from Fisher Scientific (cat no 502029444)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cn6h2","text":"Ethanol 200 proof from VWR (cat no 71006-012 (EA))","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bpdea","text":"Feeding Needle for Oral Gavage 20G x 38mm (2mm Tip) Curved from Pet Surgical (cat no DAFN2038C)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cr48b","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1qhep","text":"Vehicle is made as a solution of 60% Phosal 50PG, 30% PEG400, 10% Ethanol by volume.  Phosal 50PG and PEG400 are very viscous and so may require extra time, heat, and/or positive displacement pipets to effectively move and mix.  Dissolution of ABT263 in the vehicle requires heat (50-60°C ideally with shaking) and can be aided by sonication.  Drug can be dissolved in the vehicle at 12.5mg/ml (100mg in 8ml vehicle).  We did not test other concentrations.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
protocol_references: {"blocks":[{"key":"83kau","text":"This protocol is adapted from the protocol in: Chang J, Wang Y, Shao L, Laberge RM, Demaria  M, Campisi J, Janakiraman K, Sharpless NE, Ding S, Feng W, Luo Y, Wang  X, Aykin-Burns N, Krager K, Ponnappan U, Hauer-Jensen M, Meng A, Zhou D.  Clearance of senescent cells by ABT263 rejuvenates aged hematopoietic  stem cells in mice. Nat Med. 2016 Jan;22(1):78-83. doi: 10.1038/nm.4010.  Epub 2015 Dec 14. PMID: 26657143; PMCID: PMC4762215. https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC4762215/","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":437,"length":53}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"5949D409F0E711ED96EE0A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC4762215"}}}}

status.info: We are still developing and optimizing this protocol.

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"19mhm","text":"Give mice Navitoclax or Vehicle by oral gavage at 50mg/kg/day.  Mice receive vehicle or drug for a total of 14 days, spread across 6 weeks, as outlined in the sub-steps below.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"59h4u","text":"Mice receive seven days of once-daily oral gavage of drug or vehicle","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"14qel","text":"Then seven more days of once-daily oral gavage of drug or vehicle","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"2raoh","text":"Harvest tissues after the last day of no treatment","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: ABT263 (Navitoclax) Treatment in Mice

creator.name: Andrew Davis
creator.affiliation: Sanford Burnham Prebys Medical Discovery Institute

warning: {"blocks":[{"key":"cc6uk","text":"Always use recommended PPE from your institutional safety department (lab coat, gloves, eye protection, masks, etc.).  This can also help to prevent contamination of your samples.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
